executable.title: Average B-Values
executable.description: This program will directly average together the baseline gradients (b value equals 0) within a DWI scan. This is usually used after gtractCoregBvalues.
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this version of the GTRACT program was provided by NIH/NINDS R01NS050568-01A2S1
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Vincent Magnotta and Greg Harris.

parameters.label: Image Files and Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for specifying direct averaging of baseline gradients within a DWI scan

image.name: inputVolume
image.description: Required: input image file name containing multiple baseline gradients to average
image.label: Input Image Volume

image.name: outputVolume
image.description: Required: name of output NRRD file containing directly averaged baseline images
image.label: Output Image Volume

float.name: directionsTolerance
float.description: Tolerance for matching identical gradient direction pairs
float.label: Directions Tolerance

boolean.name: averageB0only
boolean.description: Average only baseline gradients. All other gradient directions are not averaged, but retained in the outputVolume
boolean.label: Average B0 Only

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
